title: Taliban says Afghan women can continue college, but not alongside men and only in Islamic dress
content:
1. Taliban says Afghan women can continue college, but not alongside men and only in Islamic dress  Yahoo News
  2. Taliban Say Women Can Study in Gender-Segregated Colleges  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. EXCLUSIVE Afghan women should not work alongside men, senior Taliban figure says  Reuters
  4. Women protest in support to Taliban in Nangarhar province  The Khaama Press News Agency
  5. Where have the voices gone?  Telegraph India
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タリバンは、アフガニスタンの女性が大学に通うことは可能だが、男性と一緒に通うことはできず、またイスラム教の服を着ていなければならないとしています。
塔利班称阿富汗妇女可以继续上大学，但不能与男性一起上，而且只能穿伊斯兰服装
塔利班稱阿富汗婦女可以繼續上大學，但不能與男性一起上，而且只能穿伊斯蘭服裝
